name: vscode-ts-typesafe-react-redux-snippets
displayName: TypeScript type safe React & Redux Snippets
description: TypeScript VSCode snippets for fast, concise and type safe React & Redux projects. Features: Fully Typed Redux State, Actions, Reducers, Selectors and Epics; React Component Props, defaultProps, State, Containers with mapStateToProps & mapDispatchToProps.
